Shannon was easily the best marketer that I had the privilege of working with at GoDaddy. As the lead developer of the mobile ecommerce team, I heavily relied on Shannon to provide direction on execution of the website. Any time I had questions on experience and revenue decisions for the website, Shannon was always quick to help. She made swift decisions that directly led to increased revenue for our team consistently. Shannon always stood up for me as a developer and defended my development decisions. She was easily able to compromise with development constraints and come up with optimal solutions that worked for the whole team.Our team worked with the Agile model and Shannon was critical to our success with that. She wrote clear and concise user stories and she was quick to answer questions about any confusion with priority.Not only is Shannon a great employee, she's also a great person. She brings a great, positive energy to the work environment. I don't see how it would be possible for someone to not get along with her. I hope that I get the opportunity to work with her again in the future.
